title: Ebon Shrike
description:
Ebon Shrike - EP, 2016


Track Listing:

02_Chop Stick Challenge
03_Gallows

Ebon Shrike is a band from Greensboro, NC.
Kyle McCandless- Guitar/Bass/Vocoder
Rob Sinnott- Bass/Vocals
Ben Braxton- Drums/Vocals/Loops

Vocal accompaniment and samples are lightly sprinkled throughout, but even those are more instrumental in their impact than they are focal points. Sometimes it feels like ISISâ€™s â€œPanopticon,â€ sometimes like Mogwaiâ€™s â€œHappy Songs For Happy People.â€ This is the record that your friendâ€™s older siblingâ€”in a moment of bewildering coolness and kinship that you will question for years to comeâ€”allowed you to sit around and listen to while they played Final Fantasy VII." - Amplifier Zine, http://amplifiergso.com
